# Agent Ignore File
# Patterns of files that the Coding Agent should NOT modify or analyze
# Similar to .gitignore syntax

# Dependencies
node_modules/
.venv/
venv/
env/
__pycache__/
*.pyc

# Build artifacts
dist/
build/
*.egg-info/

# IDE
.vscode/
.idea/

# Environment & secrets
.env
.env.*
*.pem
*.key

# Configuration files (should be changed manually)
.github/
*.yml
*.yaml

# Lock files
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
poetry.lock
Pipfile.lock

# Database & data
*.db
*.sqlite
*.json
data/

# Logs
*.log
logs/

# Tests (agent shouldn't modify tests without explicit request)
# tests/
# *_test.py
# test_*.py

# Documentation that shouldn't be auto-edited
CHANGELOG.md
LICENSE
CONTRIBUTING.md

# CI/CD
.gitlab-ci.yml
Jenkinsfile
azure-pipelines.yml

# Docker (should be changed manually)
Dockerfile
docker-compose*.yml
.dockerignore
